column1: of; -'s; genitive case; denotes associate,ka,hin kaː
sbj; nominative case; denotes subject (COMPLEMENT:subject|RELATIVE:who),ne,hin neː
obj; accusative case; denotes direct object (COPMLEMENT:direct object|RELATIVE:which),i,
ind; to; objective case; denotes indirect object (COMPLEMENT:indirect object|RELATIVE:whom),ko,hin koː
than; as; partitive case; denotes amount (COMPLEMENT:amount; number; quantity; magnitude|RELATIVE:the amout that), extent, or quantity,cu
at; on; in; dative case; denotes time or date (COMPLEMENT:time; date|RELATIVE:when),min,ara min
on; at; in; locative case; denotes location (COMPLEMENT:location; place|RELATIVE:where),ni,yor ni˦
via; with; through; instrumental case; denotes tool or medium (COMPLEMENT:tool; medium; instrument|RELATIVE:with which),bi,ara bi
for; so; to; purposive case; denotes purpose or goal (COMPLEMENT:purpose; end; justification|RELATIVE:for which),li,ara li
because; since; causal case; denotes cause (COMPLEMENT:cause; inciting event|RELATIVE:because of which),jow,cmn jow˩˧y˩˧
by; as; instructive case; denotes method (RELATIVE:by which),paj,eng bʌɪ̯
as; like; -ly; adverbial case; denotes manner (RELATIVE:manner in which),kwa,swa kwa
